column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jinora says : " How can you steal these bisons ?
#Text=The Earth Queen and her fancy friends pay big money for bison steaks and other rare meats .
#Text=I even heard she ate her dad 's pet bear .
#Text=" Jinora says : " You 're disgusting .
#Text=" Kai says : " Hey , do that spirit beaming thing you did to find me .
#Text=Go to the temple for help .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I ca n't .
#Text=I 'm all cramped in here and I need quiet and time to focus .
#Text=But , maybe I can send a message .
#Text=Spirits , I need your help .
#Text=Go find Bum - Ju , tell him we 're in trouble .
#Text=" Bumi says : " No , I do n't think I should apologize .
#Text=Tenzin just wants to boss everybody around .
#Text=I 'm too old for that .
#Text=Well , let 's face it .
#Text=I 'm just not cut out to be an airbender !
#Text=Well , that 's your opinion .
#Text=Wait , Jinora sent this spirit ?
#Text=Is she in trouble ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Jinora 's in trouble .
#Text=We have to go get her .
#Text=" Yung says : " How do you know ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Bum - Ju 's friend told me .
#Text=" Otaku says : " You 're able to communicate with the spirits ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " More or less , I get the gist .
#Text=Let 's go .
#Text=" Daw says : " Should n't Master Tenzin be dealing with this ?
#Text=I do n't want to get into trouble " Bumi says : " Master Tenzin is n't here .
#Text=It 's up to us .
#Text=Ikki and Meelo , grab some bison .
#Text=Airbenders , move out !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Bison rustlers .
#Text=They 've got Kai and Jinora locked in crates .
#Text=Looks like they 're getting ready to leave , we 'll have to move fast .
#Text=" Daw says : " I do n't know if I 'm ready to get in a fight with some bison rustlers .
#Text=I can tell without that telescope that they 're mean - looking .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Listen , this is what we 've been training for .
#Text=" Daw says : " We have n't been training that long .
#Text=" Bumi says : " That 's not important now .
#Text=Remembered how we persevered together on that obstacle course ?
#Text=" Otaku says : " You actually quit .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well , I 'm not quitting now .
#Text=I know we 've had a tough time , me more than anyone , but we 're airbenders , and there are n't many of us so we 've got to stick together .
#Text=They 've got two of our own in cages out there , and we 're not leaving until we bring them home .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Leave no airbender behind !
#Text=" Kai says : " In .
#Text=Down .
#Text=And twist .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Free the bison first .
#Text=" Bison rustler # 2 says : " Hey !
#Text=What are you doing out ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Kai !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What 's going on down there ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Kai !
#Text=Help !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm coming Jinora .
#Text=" Ganbat says : " What the ... " Ganbat says : " You got me .
#Text=I give up .
#Text=" Kai says : " You think you can kidnap Jinora , and all these baby bisons ?!
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Kai , that 's enough !
#Text=An airbender never attacks a defenseless opponent .
#Text=But that was very good technique .
#Text="
